## Release highlights

<!---
PR #684: Documentation Outline Page (Unresolved Conversations)
URL: https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/684
Labels: enhancement, highlight
--->
### Documentation outline page (Unresolved conversations)

Created a new Documentation Outline page

This page replaces the existing project overview page. It shows a section-by-section outline of your Project's Documentation and counts every unresolved conversation within each section.

Hover over the chat icon to see a preview of all unresolved conversations. You can click them to jump directly to the conversations.

You may also choose to resolve conversations directly from the popup.

### New Documentation Overview Page

Documentation overview page

With the latest update, the Documentation Overview Page is now more distinct from the Model Detail page. This change provides you with an easier way to navigate between sections. Additionally, you'll find enhanced data visualization which helps in better understanding the progress of the documentation stage.

PR #686: Ability to associate a Finding with a documentation section.
URL: https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/686
Labels: enhancement
--->
### Ability to associate a Finding with a documentation section

You can now associate model findings with sections within your model documentation. Doing so lets you track findings by severity, section by section on the Documentation Overview page.

You can see the total count of findings at the top of the Documentation Overview page, as well as individual counts per section. Hover over the Finding icon in each section to view related findings and click one to jump to it.

https://www.loom.com/share/2c3e2ebc3ae94cfeb23b86af2cdddf69

<img width="903" alt="Screenshot 2024-04-09 at 61359 PM" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/35815846/dbc258c2-0f02-4ca1-a337-735f5dc8ebb8">

PR #689: Added section statuses to model documentation and overview page
URL: https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/689
Labels: enhancement
--->
### added section statuses to model documentation and overview page

Added a status picker to each section of the model documentation page. This feature allows you to set whether the section is In Progress or Done.

The documentation overview page displays a total count of how many sections have been completed and shows a checkmark when a section is marked as Done.

PR #696: Added "Generate with AI" button to the CKEditor
URL: https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/696
Labels: enhancement
--->
### Add generate with AI button to the CKEditor

Added a `Generate_with_AI` button to the text editor. This button appears within the text blocks in Model Documentation and Model Validation, replacing the previous button used for AI content generation.

When you click on `Generate_with_AI`, a modal pops up showing the AI content generation options. Here, you can choose to accept or try again.

<img width="1048" alt="Screenshot 2024-04-18 at 55629 PM" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/35815846/b8cfb363-3dfb-4bfd-a638-cc728a2ad010">
